issuetype.description: A user story. Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete.
issuetype.name: Story

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: As a cloudformation user, I would like the system to keep track of tags passed into the createStack call and pass them onto resources wherever appropriate.  In addition, I would like stack-specific tags on resources to be the same as AWS.

comments.body:
will honor stack tags anywhere "Tags" is an accepted property, use --tag in the euform-create-stack command.  Also 3 tags should always propegate
aws:cloudformation:stack-id
aws:cloudformation:stack-name
aws:cloudformation:logical-id

[~ethomas],

Top notch work here man.  I threw a bunch of resources at Cloudformation, and it gave me all the good stuff. Solid work here man.  

Issue has been verified as fixed. 

Eucalyptus version:  4.1.0-0.0.23039.364.20150120gitc561880.el6

*Steps*

# On [Group #2 cloud|https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/QA/Euca+4.1+Quality+Dashboard#Euca4.1QualityDashboard-TypeofDeployments], apply the following IAM access policy to a group under a given account:
{code}
# euare-grouplistpolicies -v -g Testers --region admin-hspencer2@group2
EUCA9844
{

    }

}
